verses.verse: SHim`on <WG4826> Kefa <WG4074>, a servant <WG1401> and <WG2532> an emissary <WG652> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, to them that have obtained <WG2975> <WG5631> like precious <WG2472> faith <WG4102> with us <WG2254> through <WG1722> the righteousness <WG1343> of 'Elohim <WG2316> and <WG2532> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>:

Grace <WG5485> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515> be multiplied <WG4129> <WG5684> unto you <WG5213> through <WG1722> the knowledge <WG1922> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> our <WG2257> YY <WG2962>,

According as <WG5613> his <WG846> divine <WG2304> power <WG1411> hath given <WG1433> <WG5772> unto us <WG2254> all things <WG3956> that pertain unto <WG4314> life <WG2222> and <WG2532> godliness <WG2150>, through <WG1223> the knowledge <WG1922> of him that hath called <WG2564> <WG5660> us <WG2248> to <WG1223> glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> virtue <WG703>:

Whereby <WG1223> <WG3739> are given <WG1433> <WG5769> unto us <WG2254> exceeding great <WG3176> and <WG2532> precious <WG5093> promises <WG1862>: that <WG2443> by <WG1223> these <WG5130> ye might be <WG1096> <WG5638> partakers <WG2844> of the divine <WG2304> nature <WG5449>, having escaped <WG668> <WG5631> the corruption <WG5356> that is in <WG1722> the world <WG2889> through <WG1722> lust <WG1939>.

And <WG2532> <WG1161> beside <WG846> this <WG5124>, giving <WG3923> <WG5660> all <WG3956> diligence <WG4710>, add <WG2023> <WG5657> to <WG1722> your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> virtue <WG703>; and <WG1161> to <WG1722> virtue <WG703> knowledge <WG1108>;
And <WG1161> to <WG1722> knowledge <WG1108> temperance <WG1466>; and <WG1161> to <WG1722> temperance <WG1466> patience <WG5281>; and <WG1161> to <WG1722> patience <WG5281> godliness <WG2150>;
And <WG1161> to <WG1722> godliness <WG2150> brotherly kindness <WG5360>; and <WG1161> to <WG1722> brotherly kindness <WG5360> charity <WG26>.

For <WG1063> if these things <WG5023> be <WG5225> <WG5723> in you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> abound <WG4121> <WG5723>, they make <WG2525> <WG5719> you that ye shall neither <WG3756> be barren <WG692> nor <WG3761> unfruitful <WG175> in <WG1519> the knowledge <WG1922> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.

But <WG1063> he that <WG3739> lacketh <WG3361> <WG3918> <WG5748> these things <WG5023> is <WG2076> <WG5748> blind <WG5185>, and cannot see afar off <WG3467> <WG5723>, and hath forgotten <WG3024> <WG2983> <WG5631> that he was purged from <WG2512> his <WG846> old <WG3819> sins <WG266>.

Wherefore <WG1352> the rather <WG3123>, brethren <WG80>, give diligence <WG4704> <WG5657> to make <WG4160> <WG5733> your <WG5216> calling <WG2821> and <WG2532> election <WG1589> sure <WG949>: for <WG1063> if ye do <WG4160> <WG5723> these things <WG5023>, ye shall <WG4218> <WG4417> never <WG3364> fall <WG4218> <WG4417> <WG5661>:

For <WG1063> so <WG3779> an entrance <WG1529> shall be ministered <WG2023> <WG5701> unto you <WG5213> abundantly <WG4146> into <WG1519> the everlasting <WG166> kingdom <WG932> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> and <WG2532> Saviour <WG4990> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.

Wherefore <WG1352> I will <WG272> not <WG3756> be negligent <WG272> <WG5692> to put <WG5279> you <WG5209> always <WG104> in remembrance <WG5279> <WG5721> of <WG4012> these things <WG5130>, though <WG2539> ye know <WG1492> <WG5761> them, and <WG2532> be established <WG4741> <WG5772> in <WG1722> the present <WG3918> <WG5752> truth <WG225>.

Yea <WG1161>, I think it <WG2233> <WG5736> meet <WG1342>, as long as <WG1909> <WG3745> I am <WG1510> <WG5748> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> tabernacle <WG4638>, to stir <WG1326> you <WG5209> up <WG1326> <WG5721> by <WG1722> putting you in remembrance <WG5280>;

Knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> that <WG3754> shortly <WG5031> I must <WG2076> <WG5748> put off <WG595> this my <WG3450> tabernacle <WG4638>, even <WG2532> as <WG2531> our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> hath shewed <WG1213> <WG5656> me <WG3427>.

Moreover <WG1161> <WG2532> I will endeavour <WG4704> <WG5692> that ye <WG5209> may be able <WG2192> <WG5721> after <WG3326> my <WG1699> decease <WG1841> to have <WG4160> <WG5733> these things <WG5130> always <WG1539> in remembrance <WG3420>.

For <WG1063> we have <WG1811> not <WG3756> followed <WG1811> <WG5660> cunningly devised <WG4679> <WG5772> fables <WG3454>, when we made known <WG1107> <WG5656> unto you <WG5213> the power <WG1411> and <WG2532> coming <WG3952> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, but <WG235> were <WG1096> <WG5679> eyewitnesses <WG2030> of his <WG1565> majesty <WG3168>.

For <WG1063> he received <WG2983> <WG5631> from <WG3844> 'Elohim <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> honour <WG5092> and <WG2532> glory <WG1391>, when there came <WG5342> <WG5685> such <WG5107> a voice <WG5456> to him <WG846> from <WG5259> the excellent <WG3169> glory <WG1391>, This <WG3778> is <WG2076> <WG5748> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> Son <WG5207>, in <WG1519> whom <WG3739> I <WG1473> am well pleased <WG2106> <WG5656>.

And <WG2532> this <WG5026> voice <WG5456> which came <WG5342> <WG5685> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> we <WG2249> heard <WG191> <WG5656>, when we were <WG5607> <WG5752> with <WG4862> him <WG846> in <WG1722> the holy <WG40> mount <WG3735>.

We have <WG2192> <WG5719> also <WG2532> a more sure <WG949> word <WG3056> of prophecy <WG4397>; whereunto <WG3739> ye do <WG4160> <WG5719> well <WG2573> that ye take heed <WG4337> <WG5723>, as <WG5613> unto a light <WG3088> that shineth <WG5316> <WG5730> in <WG1722> a dark <WG850> place <WG5117>, until <WG2193> <WG3739> the day <WG2250> dawn <WG1306> <WG5661>, and <WG2532> the day star <WG5459> arise <WG393> <WG5661> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>:

Knowing <WG1097> <WG5723> this <WG5124> first <WG4412>, that <WG3754> no <WG3756> <WG3956> prophecy <WG4394> of the scripture <WG1124> is <WG1096> <WG5736> of any private <WG2398> interpretation <WG1955>.

For <WG1063> the prophecy <WG4394> came <WG5342> <WG5681> not <WG3756> in old time <WG4218> by the will <WG2307> of man <WG444>: but <WG235> holy <WG40> men <WG444> of 'Elohim <WG2316> spake <WG2980> <WG5656> as they were moved <WG5342> <WG5746> by <WG5259> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>.
